verses.verse: Now the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H1961>came<s%> to me <S%H559>saying,<s%>
<S%H1121>"Son<s%> of <S%H120>man,<s%> <S%H2330>propound<s%> a <S%H2420>riddle,<s%> and <S%H9301>speak<s%> a <S%H4912>parable<s%> to the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%>

<S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H3541>'Thus<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3068>God,<s%> "A <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H5404>eagle<s%> with <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H3671>wings,<s%> <S%H750>long<s%> <S%H83>pinions<s%> and a <S%H4392>full<s%> <S%H5133>plumage<s%> of <S%H7553>many<s%> <S%H7553>colors,<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H3844>Lebanon<s%> and <S%H3947>took<s%> away the <S%H6788>top<s%> of the <S%H730>cedar.<s%>

"He <S%H6998>plucked<s%> <S%H6998>off<s%> the <S%H7218>topmost<s%> of its <S%H3242>young<s%> <S%H3242>twigs<s%> and <S%H935>brought<s%> it to a <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H9211>merchants;<s%> he <S%H7760>set<s%> it in a <S%H5892>city<s%> of <S%H7402>traders.<s%>

"He also <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H4480>some<s%> of the <S%H2233>seed<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> and <S%H5414>planted<s%> it in <S%H2233>fertile<s%> <S%H7704>soil.<s%> He <S%H3947>placed<s%> [it] <S%H5921>beside<s%> <S%H7227>abundant<s%> <S%H4325>waters;<s%> he <S%H7760>set<s%> it [like] a <S%H6851>willow.<s%>

"Then it <S%H6779>sprouted<s%> and <S%H1961>became<s%> a <S%H8217>low,<s%> <S%H5628>spreading<s%> <S%H1612>vine<s%> with its <S%H1808>branches<s%> <S%H6437>turned<s%> <S%H413>toward<s%> him, but its <S%H8328>roots<s%> <S%H1961>remained<s%> <S%H8478>under<s%> it. So it <S%H1961>became<s%> a <S%H1612>vine,<s%> and <S%H6213>yielded<s%> <S%H909>shoots<s%> and <S%H7971>sent<s%> out <S%H6288>branches.<s%>

"But there was <S%H259>another<s%> <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H5404>eagle<s%> with <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H3671>wings<s%> and <S%H7227>much<s%> <S%H5133>plumage;<s%> and <S%H2009>behold,<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H1612>vine<s%> <S%H3719>bent<s%> its <S%H8328>roots<s%> <S%H5921>toward<s%> him and <S%H7971>sent<s%> out its <S%H1808>branches<s%> toward him from the <S%H6170>beds<s%> <S%H4302>where<s%> it was <S%H4302>planted,<s%> that he might <S%H8248>water<s%> it.

"It was <S%H8362>planted<s%> in <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H7704>soil<s%> <S%H413>beside<s%> <S%H7227>abundant<s%> <S%H4325>waters,<s%> that it might <S%H6213>yield<s%> <S%H6057>branches<s%> and <S%H5375>bear<s%> <S%H6529>fruit,<s%> [and] <S%H1961>become<s%> a <S%H155>splendid<s%> <S%H1612>vine.<s%>"'

<S%H559>"Say,<s%> <S%H3541>'Thus<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3068>God,<s%> "Will it <S%H6743>thrive<s%>? Will he not <S%H5423>pull<s%> up its <S%H8328>roots<s%> and <S%H7082>cut<s%> <S%H7082>off<s%> its <S%H6529>fruit,<s%> so that it <S%H3001>withers<s%> – so that <S%H3605>all<s%> its <S%H6780>sprouting<s%> <S%H2964>leaves<s%> <S%H3001>wither<s%>? And <S%H3808>neither<s%> by <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H2220>strength<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> by <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%> can it be <S%H5375>raised<s%> from its <S%H8328>roots<s%> [again.]

<S%H2009>"Behold,<s%> though it is <S%H8362>planted,<s%> will it <S%H6743>thrive<s%>? Will it not <S%H3001>completely<s%> <S%H3001>wither<s%> as soon as the <S%H6921>east<s%> <S%H7307>wind<s%> <S%H5060>strikes<s%> it – <S%H3001>wither<s%> on the <S%H6170>beds<s%> <S%H6780>where<s%> it <S%H6780>grew<s%>?"' "
Moreover, the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H1961>came<s%> to me <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H559>"Say<s%> <S%H4994>now<s%> to the <S%H4805>rebellious<s%> <S%H1004>house,<s%> 'Do you not <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H4100>what<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H428>things<s%> [mean?'] <S%H559>Say,<s%> <S%H2009>'Behold,<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> its <S%H4428>king<s%> and <S%H8269>princes,<s%> and <S%H935>brought<s%> them to him in <S%H894>Babylon.<s%>

'And he <S%H3947>took<s%> one of the <S%H4410>royal<s%> <S%H2233>family<s%> and <S%H3772>made<s%> a <S%H1285>covenant<s%> with him, <S%H935>putting<s%> him under <S%H423>oath.<s%> He also <S%H3947>took<s%> away the <S%H9012>mighty<s%> of the <S%H776>land,<s%>
that the <S%H4467>kingdom<s%> might be in <S%H8217>subjection,<s%> not <S%H5375>exalting<s%> itself, [but] <S%H8104>keeping<s%> his <S%H1285>covenant,<s%> that it might <S%H5975>continue.<s%>

'But he <S%H4775>rebelled<s%> against him by <S%H7971>sending<s%> his <S%H4397>envoys<s%> to <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> that they might <S%H5414>give<s%> him <S%H5483>horses<s%> and <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H5971>troops.<s%> Will he <S%H6743>succeed<s%>? Will he who <S%H6213>does<s%> <S%H428>such<s%> <S%H428>things<s%> <S%H4422>escape<s%>? Can he indeed <S%H6565>break<s%> the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> and <S%H4422>escape<s%>?

'As I <S%H2416>live,<s%>' <S%H5002>declares<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3068>God,<s%> <S%H518>'Surely<s%> <S%H3808><s%> in the <S%H4725>country<s%> of the <S%H4428>king<s%> who <S%H4427>put<s%> him on the <S%H4427>throne,<s%> <S%H834>whose<s%> <S%H423>oath<s%> he <S%H959>despised,<s%> and <S%H834>whose<s%> <S%H1285>covenant<s%> he <S%H6565>broke,<s%> in <S%H894>Babylon<s%> he shall <S%H4191>die.<s%>

'And <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> with [his] <S%H1419>mighty<s%> <S%H2428>army<s%> and <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H6951>company<s%> will not <S%H6213>help<s%> him in the <S%H4421>war,<s%> when they <S%H8210>cast<s%> up <S%H5550>mounds<s%> and <S%H1129>build<s%> <S%H1785>siege<s%> <S%H1785>walls<s%> to <S%H3772>cut<s%> <S%H3772>off<s%> <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H5315>lives.<s%>

'Now he <S%H959>despised<s%> the <S%H423>oath<s%> by <S%H6565>breaking<s%> the <S%H1285>covenant,<s%> and <S%H2009>behold,<s%> he <S%H5414>pledged<s%> his <S%H3027>allegiance,<s%> yet <S%H6213>did<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H428>things;<s%> he shall not <S%H4422>escape.<s%>' "

<S%H3651>Therefore,<s%> <S%H3541>thus<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3068>God,<s%> "As I <S%H2416>live,<s%> <S%H518>surely<s%> <S%H3808><s%> My <S%H423>oath<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> he <S%H959>despised<s%> and My <S%H1285>covenant<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> he <S%H6565>broke,<s%> I will <S%H5414>inflict<s%> on his <S%H7218>head.<s%>

"And I will <S%H6566>spread<s%> My <S%H7568>net<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> him, and he will be <S%H8610>caught<s%> in My <S%H9287>snare.<s%> Then I will <S%H935>bring<s%> him to <S%H894>Babylon<s%> and <S%H8199>enter<s%> into <S%H8199>judgment<s%> with him <S%H8033>there<s%> [regarding] the <S%H4604>unfaithful<s%> <S%H4604>act<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> he has <S%H4603>committed<s%> against Me.

"And <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4005>choice<s%> <S%H4005>men<s%> in <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H102>troops<s%> will <S%H5307>fall<s%> by the <S%H2719>sword,<s%> and the <S%H7604>survivors<s%> will be <S%H6566>scattered<s%> to <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H7307>wind;<s%> and you will <S%H3045>know<s%> that I, the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> have <S%H1696>spoken.<s%>"

<S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3068>God,<s%> "I shall also <S%H3947>take<s%> [a sprig] from the <S%H7311>lofty<s%> <S%H6788>top<s%> of the <S%H730>cedar<s%> and <S%H5414>set<s%> [it] out; I shall <S%H6998>pluck<s%> from the <S%H7218>topmost<s%> of its <S%H3127>young<s%> <S%H3127>twigs<s%> a <S%H7390>tender<s%> <S%H7390>one,<s%> and I shall <S%H8362>plant<s%> [it] on a <S%H1364>high<s%> and <S%H9642>lofty<s%> <S%H2022>mountain.<s%>

"On the <S%H4791>high<s%> <S%H2022>mountain<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> I shall <S%H8362>plant<s%> it, that it may <S%H5375>bring<s%> <S%H5375>forth<s%> <S%H6057>boughs<s%> and <S%H6213>bear<s%> <S%H6529>fruit,<s%> and <S%H1961>become<s%> a <S%H117>stately<s%> <S%H730>cedar.<s%> And <S%H6833>birds<s%> of <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H3671>kind<s%> will <S%H7931>nest<s%> <S%H8478>under<s%> it; they will <S%H7931>nest<s%> in the <S%H6738>shade<s%> of its <S%H1808>branches.<s%>

"And <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H6086>trees<s%> of the <S%H7704>field<s%> will <S%H3045>know<s%> that I am the <S%H3068>Lord;<s%> I <S%H8213>bring<s%> <S%H8213>down<s%> the <S%H1364>high<s%> <S%H6086>tree,<s%> <S%H1361>exalt<s%> the <S%H8217>low<s%> <S%H6086>tree,<s%> <S%H3002>dry<s%> up the <S%H3892>green<s%> <S%H6086>tree,<s%> and make the <S%H3001>dry<s%> <S%H6086>tree<s%> <S%H6524>flourish.<s%> I am the <S%H3068>Lord;<s%> I have <S%H1696>spoken,<s%> and I will <S%H6213>perform<s%> [it.]"
